snippet: Roy Halladay of the Phillies pitched eight innings, and Stephen Strasburg of the Nationals and Johnny Cueto of the Reds each threw seven as their teams won.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Philadelphia Phillies defeat Pittsburgh Pirates, 1-0; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Roy Halladay of the Phillies pitched eight innings, and Stephen Strasburg of the Nationals and Johnny Cueto of the Reds each threw seven as their teams won.

headline.seo: Halladay, Strasburg and Cueto Pitch Shutout Ball in Openers
headline.main: Season Opens With Starters Piling Up Scoreless Innings
headline.print_headline: Season Opens With Starters Piling Up Scoreless Innings
